summary:
Quality made textures with both 1k and 2k textures.
Baked in AO and Quality normal maps without compression artifacts.
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION: DO NOT USE DDSOPT WHILE USING THIS MOD, IT WILL DECREASE THIS MODS QUALITY DRASTICALLY, MY MOD IS OPTIMIZED FROM RELEASE.

[youtube]WbaEhFNL80o[/youtube]

Read comment section for changes.
Covered right now:
Whole Landscape
Telvaani Village

My other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66043/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Enemies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65610/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dwemer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59563/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Caves[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58461/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dragons 4K-8K[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56137/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Clouds[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38539/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49676/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul - Mountains[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53210/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Farmhouses[/url]

Here is a retexture for Dragonborn, Second part of: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38539/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul[/url]

Also, If you wish even better landscape, you should try [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41335/?]Ash rocks[/url] by michaelrw, It has optional if you want to have ash rocks fit my ash texture.

I'm not much for introduction so I go to mod description right away.

I wasn't happy about the landscape textures Skyrim had.
So I decided to make all the textures high quality and lore friendly with a realistic look.

Many other modders forget to optimize their textures causing unnecessary Vram loss.
Some even don't know how to make alphas/normal maps at all.
Some textures looks repeatable which is not good either.

This is where this mod comes in.
Quality made textures with both 1k and 2k textures.
Baked in AO and Quality normal maps without compression artifacts.

Install:
Download main mod from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38539/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul[/url] then download mainfile from here, then:
Use NMM or extract to data folder.

Thanks to Caelrya for the pictures, check her profile for more awesome pics.

Users can upload my files to other sites: You have to ask me about that.
Users can convert my file so that it works on similar games: NO
Users can modify my file; including releasing bug fixes or improving on the features my file adds to the game, and upload it as a seperate file:NO
Users can use assets contained in my files in their own files: NO
author: Frozunswaidon

files.changelogHtml: Added parallax for dragonborn roads. Enjoy enb users!
